snippet: Michael Strahan, a former Giants defensive end who will enter the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday, has not left the public eye since he retired in 2008.
abstract: Profile of Michael Strahan, co-host of ABC's Live With Kelly and Michael and a former defensive end for the New York Giants, who will be inducted into Pro Football Hall of Fame; Strahan is exceptional for having made a seamless transition from the NFL to TV, where he has remained in the spotlight since retiring from football in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Michael Strahan, a former Giants defensive end who will enter the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday, has not left the public eye since he retired in 2008.

headline.seo: Michael Strahan Still in Spotlight Ahead of Hall of Fame Induction
headline.main: Strahan Still in Spotlight Ahead of Hall of Fame Induction
headline.print_headline: New Stop After a Seamless Move
